channel.title: Translation on Asish Kumar - Software Engineer in India
channel.description: Recent content in Translation on Asish Kumar - Software Engineer in India

item.title: Hindi Translation of Cantor and KDE Connect - SoK 2024
item.description: Hindi Translation of Cantor and KDE connect - Season of KDE 2024 In this blog, I will discuss my experience with season of KDE 2024. I came to know about this program through a youtube video. I was given some pre tasks to complete by the mentors of the project which can be found at https://github.com/officialasishkumar/translation-kde-applications. After completing the pre-tasks, I applied for the project and eventually got selected. During my SoK period, I have to translate Merkuro, KDE connect, KTorrent and Cantor in Hindi.
